title: The Dead War Zombie Collection
description: All 5 Dead War Zombie Series in 1 collection! In the year 2053 the dead walked. Mankind was caught off guard at first but within six years mounted a massive military assault against the dead. These are the stories of some of those men and women that fought back. These are the stories of some trying to find a cure. These are the stories of those that are just trying to survive the nightmare of the walking dead. These are the stories of those that caused The Dead War The Dead War Collection includes: The Dead War Series Book One The Dead War Zombie Series Book Two: Abomination The Dead War Zombie Series Book Three: WAR The Dead War Zombie Series: ROGUE The Dead War Zombie Series: The Short Stories
author: George L. Cook III
